post:
Hello guys and girls,

drServer.net has not posted an offer for quite a long time, so I decided that this should be corrected today.

No more talking, lets start with the offers.

**_ByteShack_**

Those shacks are one of a kind. With SSD power, you can rest assured, that your data can be read in no time. The addition of a Gigabit port, makes sure that data can leave and enter the shack with fabulous speed.

**ByteShack Baby Plan** Get yourself a nice little baby VM. It won't cry(I promise).
<pre>
1 Shared Core
128 MB RAM
2 GB RAID10 SSD Disk Space
100 GB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps
Virtualization: Xen HVM
Price: $18/year
Order links
Buffalo: https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=104
Dallas: https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=113
Los Angeles: https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=158
</pre>

Dallas: https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=112

</pre>

**ByteShack Midi Plan** Our little baby is no longer what we remember. It's now a preschooler. We're growing. :)

Order links

Dallas: https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=115
Los Angeles: https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=160
</pre>

**The big one** Our baby is now a grown up student, who forgets to write his homework quite regularly.
<pre>
2 Shared Cores
1024 MB RAM
15 GB RAID10 SSD Disk Space
1 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps
Virtualization: Xen HVM
Price: $7.00/month
Order links
https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=165
You will be able to choose between Buffalo, Dallas and Los Angeles location during order.
</pre>

**_XenStorage_**

Our Storage plans are meant as one-way ticket for your data. This does not mean that you can not get it out, but you will sleep peacefully if you just upload it to safe storage and forget about it. It will stay in the good hands of RAID 6 for all eternity.

**100 GB**
<pre>
2 Shared Cores
512 MB RAM
100 GB SSD-Cached Disk Space
500 GB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps
Virtualization: Xen HVM
Price: $20.00/year
Order links
Dallas: https://drserver.net/drbill/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=199
</pre>

**200 GB**

Price: $7.00/month or $48/year

**_VikingLayer_**

Warriors of great destiny have risen to fight for you. They have great strength, power and spirit. They call themselves Vikings. Why don't you hire a mercenary today? :)

**All offers come with 1 IPv4, unless otherwise stated. IPv6 is available for Dallas(except XenStorage, until further notice) and Sweden on request.

**About us:**
<pre>
drServer started offering service around November of 2013, so we're close to 2 and a half years old. 
We currently manage a total of 6 brands across 4 locations.
</pre>

**Some words on LET about us:**

If you want to be featured here next time, please open a ticket. :)
<pre>
https://lowendtalk.com/discussion/19342/review-of-drserver-net-the-best-host
https://lowendtalk.com/discussion/51723/honest-review-drserver-is-da-best
https://lowendtalk.com/discussion/58273/byteshack-net-drserver-net-review-absolutely-fantastic-5-month-review
</pre>

**Useful Links:**
<pre>
Terms of Service: https://drserver.net/terms
AUP: https://drserver.net/usage
Ticket us: https://drserver.net/drbill/index.php?/tickets/new/
</pre> 

**FAQ**
<pre>
Q: Do you allow gameservers?
Because most gameservers generally attract (D)DoS attacks, we currently do not allow them on our network. 
This also applies to voiceservers such as Teamspeak and Mumble.
Q: Can I run a VPN?
Private VPN servers are perfectly fine with us. Public ones, however, are not.
Q: What's your refund policy?
We do have a 30-day refund policy for your first service with us.
Q: What payment methods are accepted?
We accept payments via PayPal, BitPay, and 2Checkout.
Q: Do you have a test IP/file?
We do, but you will need to submit a ticket.
Q: Do you offer instant setup?
Only VikingLayer orders are instantly provisioned. 
All other VPS platforms are manually provisioned by our staff within 12 hours, 
assuming you past all initial screenings. 
Please provide valid personal details and use your residential IP to order to prevent delays.
</pre>

If you have any questions, do not hesitate to ask. Nobody will bite. :)

Have a good day,

drServer.net
